You'll be on the edge of your seat as Speed Racer zooms to victory in his iconic Mach 5 car!

If you're looking for something a bit more classic and critically acclaimed, "Platoon" would be an excellent choice. Directed by Oliver Stone, this 1986 film stars Tom Berenger as a tough-as-nails sergeant in Vietnam, and it's considered one of the greatest war movies of all time.
